basics.name: Francisco Carrera
basics.label: Web Developer, Game Designer, Amateur Brewer
basics.summary: I am a web developer, game designer, armature brewer, and puzzle solver extraordinaire.   I started my own business from the ground up, getting back in the black in less than a year and successfully selling it off. After acquiring an extensive background as an entrepreneur, I transitioned into game production and expanded my skill set to include systems design and game development.   Through game design I discovered how much I loved coding and the logical structure of it. Now Iâ€™ve seen multiple project through, adapting to the situation at hand, wearing multiple hats, and putting my skills as a developer, designer, and producer to use.

work.summary: Main developer in mobile physics puzzle game.
highlights: Speared head project from setting initial repository to publishing on android marketplace
Fully implemented systems, UI, animations, and particle effects
Called on to anticipate and solve potential problems quickly and efficiently.

work.summary: As part of a small VR studio team, entrusted to transform tech demo into a cohesive game experience. Responsible for prioritizing, assigning, and tracking tasks, along with performing white-box, gray-box, and black-box testing.
highlights: Designed and implemented new puzzles, achieving a closer unified theme and a more logical progression to game flow, while remaining true to the original vision.
Scripted new functionality in Unity using C# in order to deliver a polished project on time.
Reprioritized deliverables and milestones, successfully hitting every milestone and finishing project by due date

work.summary: Responsible for working in engine, performing QA test, and managing a 20-person team.
highlights: Responsible for backlogs, sprints, meetings, product specifications, user stories, test plans, and release checklists, for design, development, art, and writing.
Communicated across management and multidiscipline teams, leading weekly studio meetings.
Assisted the studio with transition into agile development and SCRUM.

work.summary: Worked as a freelancer fulfilling various roles
highlights: Designed, prototyped and implemented multiple game systems.
Tracked, documented, and resolved bugs throughout development in a QA capacity.
Created a scaling micro-transaction system with accompanying monetization plan.
Designed, implemented and animated creature abilities into custom game engine.
Created a comprehensive marketing and community outreach plan.
